## Mission
   
We are a team of professionals that believe data and the appropriate analysis of it should drive how decisions are made in industry, government, education, and law.  We look forward to working with you to address your data driven decisions.  Our team and this website are a growing process so please work with us as we build up our site. The links below will take you to some of our different team strengths.

* [Visual Sample Plan (VSP):](vsp.html) We have over a decade of experience developing and using VSP as well as supporting the environmental community in the application of VSP.
* [VSP Training:](vsp_training.html) We provide multiple courses each year and cover all parts of VSP.
* [R Analysis and Visualization:](R.html) From support for complex climate data visualization to build energy codes studies we support the statistical analysis and visualization of data.
